segments.text: I notice a boy stretching his tiny arms toward the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His determination is admirable yet ridiculous, balancing on a stool that’s about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It seems so innocent, but the implications are concerning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t look away, wondering if someone will get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him is like a little accomplice, waiting with bated breath.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their excitement contrasts sharply with the calmness of the garden seen through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How could this chaos exist in a place that looks so tidy outside?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is so absorbed in her task that she’s oblivious to the potential disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in that puddle; will she even notice until it’s too late?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish she would look up just once, but perhaps it’s better that she doesn’t.
segments.speaker: PAR
